name: afastidioushat
text:
I love how Vlad's speech patterns find their way into his text.

Is no sexy, is sad. dr. Green baby he is dead.

text: Not only is this wonderful, I love how Poland is green: the only color not on the legend.  This either means that half of Poles think Vlad "no is Euro" and half think "snoopys balls," or that a majority of Poles think snoopys balls are not euro.

text: Vlad on the internet is the best , maybe because he is a robot .. Fond memories of his flaming Pat's Subway board- "Stalest br3ad hella charge$ 4 each t0pping"

name: tom-ba
text: On the Internets nobody knows you're a robot.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: i know EXACTLY which episode of ER he is talking about. it was hell of sad :(

name: gmm
text: It friggin' was. You and me, crumpetsandtea, we feel Vlad's pain.

name: tekende
text:
I just now realized, I'm not sure if he is saying "Dr. Green, baby, he is dead" or "Dr. Green's baby is dead." Which is it?

(I have never watched ER)

name: crumpetsandtea
text:
ok well first of all, its neither. im not sure if its vlads colorful way of speaking or the terrible emotional stress he is under that is contorting the phrase, but i believe it is more like phragments yelled out in horror:
"dr. Green! baby! he is dead! is so unfair"

When I guess it should have gone something like this:

"It is most unfortunate that the infant child that Dr. Green was trying so hard to save during the heart wrenching 44 minute drama has so untimely expired."

Or you know, whatever.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: *fragments, not PHragments

name: tekende
text: Ah, okay. Thanks for the clarification. Um, four months ago.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: I am nothing if not punctual with my replies.

name: hateandwar
text: Nothing but a terrible, unfair tragedy will stop The Make-Out King. "dammit hold on. oh damn it all. oh God why him" You can just feel the despair.

name: gussiejives
text: Anthony Edwards shall live forever in our hearts.

name: dougthehead
text: Yeah, what is with Anthony Edwards playing really likable characters that die in horribly tragic ways?  First Top Gun, then ER- something about him makes screenwriters want to kill him, but in a way that will make everyone really sad.

text:
